reviewtext: Easy to focus, easy to adjust, sharp image edge-to-edge.  These little folders are a gem -- and a little more forgiving when it comes to eye relief (you don't have to be as ultra-precise about how far you hold them from your eyes as other miniature binoculars require).Image clarity is better than any other miniature binoculars I've owned (close to a dozen pair at this point), including some that retail for 2x-3x this price.  Can't speak to their ruggedness yet but so far I'm very pleased.
summary: Worth twice the price I paid
